story.heading: Our Journey
paragraphs: Founded in 2010 by Rajesh Nandan, SafarSaga Travel began with just 2 vehicles and a vision to provide exceptional travel experiences. Today, we're one of the most trusted travel agencies in the region.

What started as a small family business has grown into a fleet of 50+ vehicles serving thousands of satisfied customers annually. Our commitment to safety, comfort, and reliability has remained unchanged since day one.

values.title: Safety First
values.description: All our vehicles undergo regular maintenance and our drivers are trained in defensive driving techniques.

values.title: Customer Focus
values.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. We go the extra mile to ensure comfortable and memorable journeys.

values.title: Family Values
values.description: As a family-run business, we treat every customer like part of our extended family.
